name: DELIVERY FOR DR SHTRAUS
description: Good evening, TERRY! Today is your first working day as our courier officer. I hope you enjoy working for our company. This short game is a PREQUEL to the more dangerous and terrifying story of Terry.  This is a performance about the first day at a new job. EACH SCENE IS A SINGLE SECTION. CONTROLS SOUNDS Jamie Lidell - Isolation loops sample pack Ghosthack_-_Free_Abstract_Percussions freesound.org THE MAIN RULE Be careful, have a good reaction and you will get success.
